item.title: 【UPSCALED】Mr.Kitty - After Dark [4K AI Upscale | HEVC 10-bit | PCM 16-bit 44.1 kHz]
item.description:
Genre: Electronic
Style: Synth-pop, New Wave
Year: 2014
Video Source: Vimeo?
Audio Source: Qobuz

"After Dark" is a song by American singer-songwriter, record producer, and DJ Mr.Kitty. It's the ninth track on his fifth album Time, released in 2014. Forrest Avery Carney (born March 24, 1992), better known as Mr.Kitty or Michael Kenneth Echo Strobes, is best known for his song "After Dark", which went viral after a fan video was published on YouTube in 2019. The song became an absolute sensation in 2020 and rode through the entirety of the pandemic.

The fan video, made by "Diana Darkangel" (now "Diana Sandra"), was created with footage from “Career Opportunities,” a 1991 film with Jennifer Connelly. It got over 60 million views on Youtube, before it was removed due to copyright reasons.

Mr.Kitty wrote in a reaction on Twitter: "Nobody paid for anything / Target has nothing to do with it. It’s a fan video. Diana Sandra spliced clips from the movie “Career Opportunities” over my music and uploaded it to YouTube. I appreciate the attention, but the video is not my vision. Also, I’m getting paid for the views."

Release Info
I've found this video in my 2do map. I can't remember who requested it and where I got the video from.
The source is a 1080p edit, almost identical to Diana Darkangel's clip (released in 720p).
The video track is upscaled to 4K with Topaz Video AI and encoded to HEVC 10-bit.
The PCM track is lossless (Qobuz, CD quality) and synced with Adobe Audition.
The timed lyrics are synced and edited. Enable the subtitles to see the lyrics.
